info.short_description: A Mastodon instance, open to everyone, but mainly English and French speaking.
info.full_description:
Follow @status for status updates, planned downtimes, etc.

You may support the hosting of this instance on Liberapay or Patreon.

There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules.

Any user not respecting these rules may get silenced or suspended.

Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

  • Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited
  • Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description
  • NSFW content cannot be published publicly and must be unlisted or private.
  • Bots are allowed. However, bots tooting in the public timelines may get silenced if they toot too much. Bots mentionning users too many times without their consent may get suspended.

info.short_description:
Awoo.space is a Mastodon instance where members can rely on a team of moderators to help resolve conflict, and limits federation with other instances using a specific access list to minimize abuse.

While mature content is allowed here, we strongly believe in being able to choose to engage with content on your own terms, so please make sure to put mature and potentially sensitive content behind the CW feature with enough description that people know what it's about.

Before signing up, please read our community guidelines. While it's a very broad swath of topics it covers, please do your best! We believe that as long as you're putting forth genuine effort to limit harm you might cause ‚Äì even if you haven't read the document ‚Äì you'll be okay!
info.full_description:
Awoo.space is a Mastodon instance where members can rely on a team of moderators to help resolve conflict, and limits federation with other instances using a specific access list to minimize abuse. It isn't aimed at any specific audience, though there are a lot of queer furries here for some reason üòÑ

While mature content is allowed here, we strongly believe in being able to choose to engage with content on your own terms, so please make sure to put mature and potentially sensitive content behind the content warning (CW) feature with enough description that people know what it's about.

Before signing up, please read our community guidelines. While it's a very broad swath of topics it covers, please do your best! We believe that as long as you're putting forth genuine effort to limit harm you might cause ‚Äì even if you haven't read the document ‚Äì you'll be okay!

Favicon, about page and menu column art by @kyra (@heres_ky on Twitter)

This server uses Mutant Standard emoji made by Dzuk (plus some more that aren't part of Mutant Standard, including controller emoji and hbomb DK64 fan emoji), which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Blobhaj emojos by Heatherhorns are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

info.short_description: A friendly server from Germany ‚Äì which tends to attract techy people, but welcomes everybody. This is one of the oldest Mastodon instances.
info.full_description:
This instance uses the Mastomojies set by @seppini.
You can copy them in your admin panel or get them here.

Notice

Our terms don't yet reflect it for technical reasons but logfiles are now purged after 7 days!

Staff

@Cedara (Moderator)
@Meldrian (Moderator)
@wuffel (Moderator)
@Milan (Site Owner)
@Thomas (Co-Admin for emergency access)

Guidelines

On social.tchncs.de our primary directive is:
‚Üí "Be nice to each other!"

Please remember there are real people on the other side of the screen, and those people may have different feelings and opinions and experiences than you do. Some of them may be tired or having a bad day. Or you might.

You don't have to agree with someone to be civil to them. If you can't be civil to someone, leave them alone.

If you don't wish to interact with someone, or see any of their posts, there are tools at your disposal including mute and block functions.

If someone's posts make you angry or upset, take some time to calm down before you reply. You might also try simply excusing yourself from a conversation and ask them to untag you if you no longer wish to discuss a topic.

When someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. If you feel like you can't control your urge to respond to that person, use the block or mute feature so you won't see their posts and be tempted.

Keep in mind that while you cannot control other people's behavior, you are still responsible for your own conduct, even if you feel someone was rude to you or someone else.

We will not allow abusive or disruptive conduct by or toward users on social.tchncs.de. This includes continuing to engage in conversation with someone who has specifically requested you leave them alone, inciting other users to engage with that person on your behalf, aggregating and posting another person's personal information without their consent, and inciting others to engage with that person on other platforms. Blocking someone and then sitting on the other side of a block and continuing to talk about that person is also a provoking behavior.

Before you post, think about whether this is the kind of thing you would like to see (or would like your mom or kids to see) in the public timeline. There are post visibility settings that give you some control over which timelines your post appears in, and also CW and NSFW buttons to hide specific text and images in your post. Be a good social media neighbor and use these functions when appropriate.

Content not allowed on social.tchncs.de

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism; Antisemitism, Antiziganism or related.
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Content that is considered to be misinformation/conspiracy

Content which will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Untagged pornography- and sexually explicit content
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    • We will also remove any content we judge to be hateful toward specific individuals or groups, or intended to cause or incite harm from the public timeline. This includes Ableism.

    This guideline is intentionally vague because we do not intend to play "rules lawyer" on the subject of what it is and isn't okay to say about people. A good rule of thumb is, if you're about to say something you think might fall foul of this rule, you probably shouldn't say it. ‚ò∫

Timeline Flooding

In order to keep the best user experience, we ask you not to send like twenty toots in two minutes (exemplification) as people want to be able to see more than just one user in their timelines.
Of course we understand and may do an exception for critical reasons of yours like a kind of serious emergency situation for example.

Crossposting

Your account must not be used as a sole mirror of some other platform: by having an account on this server, the team and fellow users expect to interact with ‚Äì and read from ‚Äì a real and authentic person. We understand that you might want to also crosspost from other platforms, but we also ask you to not do that exclusively.

Reporting / Moderation Notes

If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review,
it is very important for us, as it makes our work easier and this instance a more enjoyable place.
Please note however that repeately falsely reporting users is not welcomed and are treated as feature-abuse.

In case you broke our rules by mistake, we may try to reach out to you so please make sure not to block the team of social.tchncs.de.

These guidelines are not a legal document, they're here to provide you with an insight into our moderation policies. Final interpretation is up to the administration of social.tchncs.de and the administration reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Federation status

social.tchncs.de does not believe in censorship. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort where content from another server may cause problems under German law, or in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation or silence another instance for one/some of these reasons, it will be noted here (now further below). Did we make a wrong decision in your opinion? Ping us!


(Note: you can still communicate with users on silenced instances; their posts will not appear in our public timelines. You will not be able to see posts made by users on suspended instances.)

Reporting an issue

For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact" For content or abuse issues:

  • if you're a user on social.tchncs.de you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
  • If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact"


For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

Funding

Our servers and related are crowdfunded and thereby made possible by our amazing community. üòç

Privacy

Please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

social.tchncs.de does not use advertising or external analytics software and does not sell your information.
(Instead you can help us by dropping a small donation. &#9825 üòâ)

Machine learning

We do not intend this sites contents to be used for training machine learning models and related technologies. Without the specific permission from the site owner and the affected users, you are strictly forbidden from doing so.


-> Imprint

Animal Liberation Network is a community for animal activists on the Fediverse. You can connect with other activists through the local timeline, as well as spread your activism to the outside world with the federated timeline.

info.short_description: Icosahedron.website is a mastodon instance and part of the ActivityPub network / the Fediverse.
info.full_description:
Site rules

In order for this website to be able to function, there are some rules that you will have to follow while using it.

Be friendly.

  • The internet is a network that connects people using computers. The other endpoint is a human being with an inner life just as complex as your own. Act accordingly.
  • Consider the reach of the posts you make. Tag content that you expect others might not want to see.
  • Harassment and bullying of any kind are not tolerated here. Do not engage with a user if they do not want you to. Do not ask other users to, either.

Don‚Äôt start shit.

  • Do not make posts just to get angry reactions.
  • ‚ÄúI was being ironic‚Äù is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.
  • Do not drag unrelated people into a discussion.

Obey the law.

  • Specifically, German (server location) and Estonian (owner location) law.
  • No illegal file sharing, no illegal pornography, no publication of personal protected information, no holocaust denial, you know the drill.

Spam is not allowed.

  • Bots that interact with a user without a users explicit request are not allowed.
  • Automated or excessive advertising is not allowed.

Be aware of the nature of the network.

  • This website is part of a network of similar websites. Other websites may have different rules.
  • The local administration has little control over users of other websites. You can, however, block and mute them - same as local users.
  • In egregious cases, remote users or entire groups of users may be blocked from interacting with users of this website.

Fascism is incompatible with a free exchange of ideas.

  • When you endorse racism, exclusion and the structural and physical violence that come with it, you show yourself to not be interested in any sort of dialogue.
  • Those who work towards a society based on chauvinism and nationalism rather than peaceful coexistance are not welcome here.

Admin decisions are final.

  • The interpretation of these rules is up to the administration and an admins decision overrides the rules.
  • ‚ÄúTechnically I did not violate any rule‚Äù is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.
  • The rules may be changed or amended when necessary.

These goal of these rules is to ensure a safe and welcoming environment.

  • Rule enforcement is guided by this goal.
  • Any enforcement action will generally be kept between those involved.
  • Try to self-moderate, but do not hesitate to involve an admin when necessary.
  • There are presently two people with administrative access to the website, @halcy, @dotUser .
  • You can report rule violations via the report function, or via e-mail.

You can find information about our terms of service and privacy policy here.

Instance mascot

The instance mascot was drawn by „Å¶„ÇÄ„Çå„ÅÑ.

German legal notices

Als Betreiber dieser Webseite schlie√üe ich eine Haftung, auch fahrl√§ssige, f√ºr von Benutzern erstellte, hochgeladene oder verlinkte Inhalte aus. Meldungen √ºber Rechtsverst√∂√üe sind mir per e-mail an die Adresse lorenzd+imprintmasto@gmail.com kenntlich zu machen.

Diese Webseite wird nicht gesch√§ftsm√§√üig und ohne Gewinnerziehlungsabsicht betrieben. Aus besonderer Vorsicht heraus, und um zu vermeiden, im Rahmen automatischer Prozesse f√§lschlicherweise abgemahnt zu werden, geben wir hier dennoch folgendes an:

Verantwortlich f√ºr diese Webseite im Sinne von ¬ß5 TMG ist:

Lorenz Diener
Herne 23-15
10135 Tallinn
Estland

lorenzd+imprintmasto@gmail.com

info.short_description:
European mastodon instance hosted in Luxembourg. Also beer, privacy and free software lovers. Join us!
This service is managed by alarig and valere.
Photo from https://www.flickr.com/photos/cogdog/
info.full_description:
This service is offered by alarig and valere


If you have trouble with the instance (as a user or as a fellow admin), please toot the admin @alarig@hostux.social or send an email.


üìú Rules:

‚Ä¢ Use English or French to request an account
‚Ä¢ Use English or French to report an account or a toot
‚Ä¢ Only fill a report if one goes against the rules, it‚Äôs not really my problem if someone doesn‚Äôt agree with you
‚Ä¢ Add comments in your reports otherwise they‚Äôll be ignored
‚Ä¢ If you want to report an account exterior to hostux, only do so for illegal content in France or Norway. If you don‚Äôt want to read them, mute them.

‚Ä¢ Respect each other ü§ù
‚Ä¢ If you follow the Humans Rights (EN/FR), nothing bad should happen üòâ
‚Ä¢ Don't spam ‚úã
‚Ä¢ No racism, xenophobia, sexism, discrimination‚Ä¶ ‚òÆÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ Please don't post illegal content (or links to) in France ‚õî
‚Ä¢ For NSFW content, use the content warning or the NSFW filter, otherwise please post your toot as unlisted üîû
‚Ä¢ Use content warning for spoilers ‚ùó
‚Ä¢ Bots and commercial accounts are allowed only I they don't spam/flood and post as unlisted ü§ñ
‚Ä¢ A local account may be muted or banned if they don't follow the rules. üîê
‚Ä¢ We only block/silence foreign accounts and instances for legal reasons.
‚Ä¢ Have fun üéâ

If you're not sure about the rules whether it's because you want to sign up or post something, please contact the admin.

When you'll sign up, you'll be following a few accounts by default. The admin chose them to make your timeline more lively, but you are free to follow and unfollow anyone!


üíª What's behind?

This instance is hosted on virtuals machines on Gandi infrastructure at Bissen.

The servers have the following specifications:

8 + 4 + 2 + 8 cores
12 + 6 + 2 + 16 GB of RAM
200 + 500¬†Go of storage
Hosted at Gandi, in Bissen, Luxembourg.
Linux based
Good security practices
Good uptime
IPv6 compatible, always running the latest stable of Mastodon
Weekly backups of the database and files, on another server hosted at Ikoula, in Reims, France.
I also backup the backups once in a while to a server in my home.

info.short_description: A small island of the fediverse. ◊ê
info.full_description:
Welcome to the ◊ê community!


First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

  • The respect of others is primary.
  • This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.
  • Each user is responsible of their account.

Rules of Aleph.land

You can be suspended for:

  • Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).
  • Taking part of a harassment.
  • Putting someone in danger.
  • Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.
  • Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

You can be muted from the public timelines for:

  • Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:
    • nudity (#nude)
    • gore (#gore)
    • pornography (#porn)
    • a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)
    • spoil (#spoil)
  • Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.
  • Making abusive ads.
  • Posting automatic toots from another source.

Please keep in mind that these rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.
If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :)

You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: liberapay.com/Aleph.LAND

This is a self-hosted and personal Mastodon instance.

It is not open to registrations.

This instance is source-based with a little patch to extend the character limit to 2048.

Si vous recherchez une instance Mastodon francophone, vous pouvez regarder :

  • Anancus, que j'ai cr√©√©
  • Piaille

Et bienvenue sur Mastodon üëã

Guarantees

  • We do not track you, but others on the Fediverse might.
  • Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.

Rules

Maly has a few rules defined as follows:

  • Respect everyone: we actively moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia... Any kind of discrimination.
  • No NSFW without at least having a content-warning and/or posting as unlisted.
  • Any content that is illegal in Belgium, France or Germany is prohibited.
  • Do not gather information about our users by means of web scrapers or other software alike.
  • Don't spam.
  • Have fun üéâ

We will do our best to get in touch with anyone breaking one or more of these rules before taking any action on the account. Illegal content will be deleted on sight and the account warned. Repeatedly or blatantly breaking these rules will result in the account being suspended.

Behind the scenes

This Mastodon instance is provided by Tijl, a person from Belgium. Our servers are hosted by Netcup in Germany while media files are hosted by OVH in France. If you want to donate, you can through Liberapay or through PayPal (send a message to @kindly first). That said, I am able to cover the full cost of the infrastructure without issue.

Goug√®re ?

Vous vous trouvez sur l'instance Mastodon de Goug√®re, un r√©seau informatique g√©r√© sur notre temps libre. L'instance est maintenue par @papaeng89 et @yapret.

Le serveur se trouve dans un datacenter parisien de Scaleway.

Quelques r√®gles

De mani√®re g√©n√©rale, les utilisateurs de cette instance sont invit√©s √† respecter la Netiquette (telle que d√©crite dans la RFC 1855).

Les contenus NSFW sont autoris√©s seulement s'ils sont tagg√©s comme tels et l√©gaux en France, de m√™me que les spoilers pouett√©s doivent l'√™tre sous Content Warning explicite. Il est souhaitable que chacun tente, dans la mesure du possible, de ne pas flooder, notamment sur les timelines publiques.

La libert√© des uns s'arr√™te l√† o√π commence celle des autres. Si quelqu'un empi√®te sur la v√¥tre, vous pouvez le bloquer et/ou le signaler aux administrateurs, qui se chargeront, avec l'avis de la communaut√©, de prendre les mesures n√©cessaires.

Nous aider

L'acc√®s √† l'instance est gratuit et le restera, mais le r√©seau Goug√®re a un co√ªt. Pour nous aider √† le supporter, c'est par l√† : https://www.patreon.com/yapret

Cr√©dits

Miniature du serveur : CC BY 2.0 Jules Morgan

info.short_description: This is a mastodon instance for queer people and friends
info.full_description:
This is a mastodon instance for queer people and friends

Goals

The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space.
As such, we have a few rules we'd like everyone on the instance to follow, which can be found on this page

Technical Information

This instance is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted at Hetzner. This instance is running on a VM on the same server as imaginair.es and is financed using Patreon (with the extra coming from @wxcafe).

This instance does not run Genuine Mastodon¬©Ô∏è Software‚Ñ¢Ô∏è, and instead uses the Glitch-soc fork. This allows us to have a lot more features, notably accessiblity tweaks, and work with a more open and helpful development team. As such, I'd like to thank Claire for her efforts with the development of both glitch-soc and mainline mastodon, and her precious help with the various problems I have encountered while managing this instance and imaginair.es.

More

Coffee Mug art by Ciara

Feel free to contact me for more informations at the email address in the right sidebar, or directly on Mastodon :)

info.short_description: This is my personal Mastodon server, with a few extra people on it.
queer anarchist communist cyber pirate ship
info.full_description:
Octodon:




welcome on the octodon (it/they).
this is our ship and it was built for Liberation, back in 2017 when i joined this federated ocean, to have a reliable space for myself and any friend who felt safer here.
to be free from sexists, racists, transphobes, homophobes, ableists, eugenicists, capitalists, classists, nazis, liberals, and self-sufficient libertarians all the same. they will be shot on sight and without trial or warning or mercy. all cops are bastards, all terves will die alone, all nazis shall be skinned first.
this is a place where we can live and express ourselves freely as oppressed masses of violent systems; it is about seizing our social media and having a place to accompany us thru our struggles, where freedom is about punching up, not down or sideways.
a feminist, anarchist, communist, cyberpunk culture, with many trans and queer people, often with tech or scientific interests. if you're a part of it, i will fight for you and by your side. if you betray us, you will be thrown overboard.
we use the defederation cannon often & easily; any instance that will inflict such pains on me or my users will be suspended as we see fit. free speech types are not on thin ice, our hull will go right thru them.

registrations are closed because unlimited growth is not sustainable and octodon is already pretty big, but members can share invites. this link of trust eliminates most of the spam issue and ensures a slow-paced organic growth.

additionally to this,
* please do not flood the local timeline; it's good that there's a bit of everyone in there and in moderation. it's especially important for bots.
* bot accounts: are allowed, but i would like to be asked first, and it has to be of public interest or a personal project of yours. if it posts frequently, consider auto-deleting the posts after a while to free space.
* content warnings: are encouraged, with no strict requirements except for public timelines (porn & violence). this is foremost between you and who will see your posts

emoji sources _
:saw: https://github.com/oneeyedman/jigsawmoji/
:chefkiss: https://www.jenlewis.website/chefs-kiss-emojis
:ahegao: https://e621.net/posts/2294576

donations _
* patreon
* liberapay
* bitcoin: bc1qaqyuy7223qqxz2jcegffqqjfdwndtg56cdrw3a
* or get a VPN here if you need one

over tor: http://octodonicg5yroqn2k6rvqayogs3d4ksyeokdtgot6yusdglmxcv2oqd.onion/

ACP Code of Conduct

General rules

  • All forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in targeted harrasment, and any kind of oppressive slurs are strictly prohibited.
  • Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here.
  • Porn and nudity are allowed, but must have a CW. Lolicon and sexual discussions or depictions of minors are never allowed.
  • Parody accounts are allowed, and must be identified as such in their description or name.
  • Cross posting from a twitter account is allowed but must be set to unlisted or private. It must include a content warning if the subject requires it, or if the crossposter does not support them, you should take care to prefix your tweets with a "CW:" or "TW:".

Reporting content / abuse

You can report a toot by using the built-in "report" button, which appears under every toot ("three dots" button). Please include a descriptive comment, so we can better understand what's going on.

Sanctions

Toots violating our Code of Conduct can be removed by moderators. Depending on the reported violation, your account may be suspended or silenced.

Moderators

  • @a000d4f7a91939d0e71df1646d7a48
  • @Butch2Therapie

We are anticapitalist, but unfortunately capitalism isn't dead yet. Currently, it costs $58.80/month for Hugo's services, including server hosting. Donations can be made at Patreon, PayPal Thank you for any help you're able and willing to share!
